title: How did Stride's (ticker: LRN) adjusted operating income compare to management projections (at midpoint) on a quarterly basis in FY2025? Format as % BEAT or MISS. Use guidance provided on a quarterly basis. If the company did not provide guidance for one or more quarters, indicate this in the answer as "no guidance." Format the answer as: "[X]Q FY2025 [X.XX] % beat/miss / no guidance; ...".
description:
1) Identify Actual AOI for each quarter of FY2025:
 Q1 FY2025: $58.4M
 Q2 FY2025: $135.6M
 Q3 FY2025: $141.7M
 Q4 FY2025: $130.6M
 
 2) Identify quarterly AOI guidance by reviewing Stride’s FY2024 Q4 release (pre-FY2025) and FY2025 Q1–Q3 releases: 
 Q1 FY2025: no quarterly guidance was issued (FY2024 Q4 release explicitly said no separate guidance before Q1 results; 
 Q2 FY2025: AOI $115–$125 million, midpoint = ($115M + $125M)/2 = $120.0M.
 Q3 FY2025: AOI $130–$140 million, midpoint = ($130M + $140M)/2 = $135.0M.
 Q4 FY2025: Full FY2025 AOI $455-$465 million, midpoint = ($455M + $465M)/2 = $460.0M. To calculate midpoint of 4Q AOI guidance, subtract YTD actual results (1Q-3Q) from Full year guidance. Q4 FY2025 AOI midpoint = $460M - $58.4M - $135.6M - $141.7M = $124.3M
 
 3) Compute beat/miss vs guidance midpoint for each Q: 
 Q1 FY2025: no guidance
 Q2 FY2025 beat/miss = (135.6 − 120.0) / 120.0 × 100 = 13.00%
 Q3 FY2025 beat/miss = (141.744 − 135.0) / 135.0 × 100 = 5.00%
 Q4 FY2025 beat/miss = (130.6 - 124.3) / 124.3 *100 = 5.00%
 
 
 4) Produce final formatted answer string covering all FY2025 quarters, indicating “no guidance” where applicable and using two-decimal precision for beats/misses as computed above. (Sources as cited in Steps 1–3.)
 1Q FY2025 no guidance; 2Q FY2025 13.00% BEAT; 3Q FY2025 5.00% BEAT; 4Q FY2025 5.00% BEAT.
answer: 1Q FY2025 no guidance; 2Q FY2025 13.00% BEAT; 3Q FY2025 5.00% BEAT; 4Q FY2025 5.00% BEAT.

rubric.criteria: Q1 FY2025: no guidance provided by company
Q2 FY2025 AOI guidance range $115–$125M with midpoint $120.0M
Q3 FY2025 AOI guidance range $130–$140M with midpoint $135.0M
Full FY2025 AOI guidance $455–$465M midpoint $460.0M -> Q4 AOI midpoint computed as $460.0M − $58.4M − $135.6M − $141.7M = $124.3M
Q2 FY2025 percent beat vs midpoint =13.00% BEAT
Q3 FY2025 percent beat vs midpoint = 5.00% BEAT
Q4 FY2025 percent beat vs midpoint = 5.00% BEAT
Final formatted answer string present as: 1Q FY2025 no guidance; 2Q FY2025 13.00% BEAT; 3Q FY2025 5.00% BEAT; 4Q FY2025 5.00% BEAT.
